overview:
Jay Yu is a trusted team leader and motivator, responsible for company vision, strategy and user experience. He is a designer and entrepreneur with a passion for developing customer obsessions with experiences and brands.

Growing up in the Bay Area, Jay has been involved with start-ups and product development since he was 17. In 2007, he co-founded BLACK Design Associates, a Los Angeles based strategy and development consultancy. Since it’s short existence, BLACK has aided product and brand development for: Epson, P&G, Henkel, Mattel, Jakks Pacific and Disney, and has helped incubate disruptive brands like InStyler.

Jay’s latest passion is Heirloom, a collaborative family experience that helps customer’s connect to and find meaning from their history, family and future. As an adopted child, Heirloom is especially important to Jay because he realizes that his life has been defined by the support, sacrifices and aspirations of family, close friends and colleagues. Jay’s vision is to create a tool that can capture and preserve these experiences, so that they can be passed down and shared with subsequent generations and live on.
